name: Mack TRUESDALE, Petitioner, v. David DIGUGLIELMO, Superintendent of Graterford Prison and District Attorney of Philadelphia County, Respondents

parties: Mack TRUESDALE, Petitioner, v. David DIGUGLIELMO, Superintendent of Graterford Prison and District Attorney of Philadelphia County, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of October, 2007, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
934 A.2d 1153
Mack TRUESDALE, Petitioner, v. David DIGUGLIELMO, Superintendent of Graterford Prison and District Attorney of Philadelphia County, Respondents.
No. 118 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 15, 2007.
